data.text: @hunterschwarz @MormonHistoryJI That would be more impressive if the press in the room hadn't been hand-picked and entirely LDS.
Nelson on women in the Church: "We depend on their voices ... We need their voices, we need their input."

Nelson, when asked what he'll do to bring women, people of color, and non-American Mormons more into the decision-making process said local Church leadership is more diverse than top leadership, and  "we'll live to see the day when there'll be other flavors in the mix"
First question at press conference is about the Church's stance on LGBT issues. President Nelson: "God loves his children and he wants them to have joy. ... there's a place for everyone."
